strapiPost.title: Color Your Weekend During The Holi Festival At The Momentary
strapiPost.content:
Shake off the winter cold and celebrate the start of spring during the Holi Festival this Saturday, Apr 8, from 12-3p at the Momentary in Bentonville.

  • Family fun: Hosted by the Indian Cultural Association of NWA, the celebration will feature traditional Indian food, music, dancing, and fun for the entire family while learning about unique cultures in our area.
  • Colors of spring: Celebrating the vibrancy of life, a fun element of Holi is the throwing of brightly colored pigment powder, so wear clothes that you don't mind getting dirty and be ready to join the fun!

The event is free to drop by anytime between 12-3p. Find more details HERE.
